recipes.name: Apple Puree
instructions: Peel, core, and chop the apples.
Place the apples in a saucepan with enough water to cover them.
Cook over medium heat until the apples are soft.
Puree the apples in a blender or food processor until smooth.

recipes.name: Carrot Puree
instructions: Place the carrots in a saucepan with enough water to cover them.
Cook over medium heat until the carrots are soft.
Puree the carrots in a blender or food processor until smooth.

recipes.name: Banana Mash
instructions: Mash the banana with a fork until smooth.

recipes.name: Avocado Puree
instructions: Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit.
Scoop out the flesh and mash with a fork until smooth.

recipes.name: Banana Yogurt Mash
recipes.instructions: Mash a banana and mix with yogurt for a smooth puree.

recipes.name: Oatmeal with Banana
recipes.instructions: Cook oats and mix with mashed banana.

recipes.name: Carrot Puree
recipes.instructions: Steam carrots until soft, then blend into a puree.

recipes.name: Sweet Potato Mash
recipes.instructions: Boil or steam a sweet potato until soft, then mash it.

recipes.name: Avocado Banana Blend
recipes.instructions: Mash banana and avocado together for a creamy blend.

recipes.name: Rice Cereal with Apple
recipes.instructions: Mix rice cereal with finely mashed apple for a smooth texture.

recipes.name: Chicken and Carrot Puree
recipes.instructions: Boil chicken and carrots until soft, then blend together.

recipes.name: Lentil Soup
recipes.instructions: Cook lentils, carrots, and tomatoes until soft, then mash lightly.

recipes.name: Egg and Avocado Toast
recipes.instructions: Scramble eggs and spread on toasted bread with mashed avocado.

recipes.name: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta and blend tomatoes and bell peppers for a simple sauce.

recipes.name: Chicken and Rice
recipes.instructions: Boil chicken and rice, then add zucchini for a complete meal.

recipes.name: Salmon and Sweet Potato
recipes.instructions: Bake salmon and sweet potato, then steam broccoli for a nutritious meal.

recipes.name: Beef and Vegetable Stew
recipes.instructions: Cook beef with vegetables until tender for a hearty stew.
